AbstractCombatItem Class Reference

The AbstractCombatItem class is a derivative of AbstractMapItem and a base class for the Player and all moving combat enabled AbstractMapItems. More...

Detailed Description

The AbstractCombatItem class is a derivative of AbstractMapItem and a base class for the Player and all moving combat enabled AbstractMapItems.
